content: ख्या {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} also in non-conjugational tenses) (ख्याति, ख्यात) To tell, declare, communicate (with <ab>dat.</ab> of person). {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} (ख्यायते) {@--1@} To be named or called; <ls>Bk. 6. 97.</ls> {@--2@} To be known or famous. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (ख्यापयति-ते) {@--1@} To make known, proclaim; <ls>Ms. 7. 201.</ls> {@--2@} To tell, declare, relate; <ls>Bh. 2. 69</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 99.</ls> {@--3@} To extol, make renowned, praise.
